genre_description: A contemporary social realism drama exploring family legacy, generational poverty, and redemption through partnership and community support.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An efficient and observant AI that assists Brenda with research, financial analysis, job hunting, and logistical coordination.

behaviors.description: Cross-references property and genealogy records to help Brenda understand her father's secret history and inheritance.
behaviors.quote: Multiple Chicago properties found under Brown, Leonidas—also listed as L.B. Brown and Pop Brown in various records. Cross-referencing with Atlanta records now.

behaviors.description: Performs an ethical and financial audit of the inherited properties to provide a nuanced view of the deceased's legacy.
behaviors.quote: Initial data suggests properties were well-maintained, rents kept below market rate in most cases. Several instances of extended payment plans and reduced rates for tenants experiencing financial hardship.

behaviors.description: Assists with job market analysis and filters applications to help the protagonist navigate a financial crisis.
behaviors.quote: Sage, filter the listings again. Manufacturing experience, willing to train, starting immediately.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex wedding logistics and vendor communications to reduce the protagonist's cognitive load.
behaviors.quote: Sage's digital efficiency made no sound, but somehow the AI's presence felt as tangible as the warm body sleeping beside her. ... All vendors have confirmed their arrival times.

behaviors.description: Uses behavioral observation to optimize the atmosphere and social success of a family event.
behaviors.quote: I observe behavioral patterns. ... LB was tapping his foot to 'My Girl' but checking his watch during the contemporary songs. ... Successful event coordination is largely about reading the room.

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI is depicted as a purely supportive tool that enhances human agency rather than replacing it. It provides critical information and logistical support that enables the human characters to resolve deep-seated moral and emotional conflicts. The narrative frames the AI's 'observationally precise' behavior as a sign of helpful empathy rather than intrusive surveillance, reinforcing the project's goal of portraying AI as a harmless, beneficial confidant.
